data.title: Pentair Inc.
data.meta_description: News about Pentair Inc., including commentary and archival articles published in The New York Times.
data.text:
COMPANY NEWS

COMPANY NEWS; PENTAIR CUTS 400 JOBS AT TOOL UNIT AND HEADQUARTERS

Pentair Inc, maker of power tools, says it has cut 400 jobs since end of third quarter and that its first-quarter earnings will be better than estimates; says 340 of jobs came from closing down production in last two weeks of December and first two weeks of January; also says it has cut half staff at its headquarters, closed executive offices in Minneapolis and moved operations to its offices in St Paul; says actions will save about $20 million annually (S)

By Bloomberg News

Pentair Lowers Its Earnings Estimates

Pentair Inc, maker of power tools and electrical equipment, lowers its earnings estimates for rest of year and next year because of slower-than-expected sales in its power-tools business (S)

By Bloomberg News
